description: Alterations and extensions in association with change of use of the building, including extensions as approved by listed building consent ref 2019/4344/L dated 11.6.20 (for the excavation of basement extension and erection of part single-storey, part four-storey rear extension above; formation of roof terraces at first and main roof levels; erection of dormer roof extension and installation of 2 rooflights to rear roofslope; installation of glazed balustrade to rear parapet across nos 14 and 15; internal renovations including reinstatement of openings between nos 14 and 15 at all floor levels), plus various minor external and internal amendments including additional rooflight at ground floor level and new windows to the rear courtyard.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
